DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare glaucoma patients' own I Care measurements by the standard Goldmann applanation tonometer intraocular pressure (IOP) measurements.
DOC.brief_title: ICare Self-tonometry - A Head-to-head Comparison to the Gold Standard Goldmann Tonometer
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension (OHT):with/without glaucoma drugs Primary open angle glaucoma (POAG) high pressure: Diagnosis based on optic nerve head rim loss and/or visual field defects and intraocular pressure (IOP) >21 mmHg. Pigmentary Glaucoma (PDG): Diagnosis based on optic nerve head rim loss and/or visual field defects and intraocular pressure (IOP) >21 mmHg, with Krukenberg's spindle and/or pigment dispersed on the trabecular meshwork.
